plot outline: Bafna Jeweller robbery case is unsolved since last three months the senior officers are sitting on the head of constable Pralhad and his two senior officers one day Pande an accused in the robbery gets caught with looted booty in his confession he tells that this is only half the booty he looted the remaining is kept at his native in Bihar.Pralhad and his senior officers who haven't taken a holiday since long decide to travel to Bihar for holiday in the name of solving the case.
title: Shentimental
plot: Three buddy cops land a case that could change the course of their career, as they capture a suspect who is a part of a major jewelry crime syndicate.

Bafna Jeweller robbery case is unsolved since last three months the senior officers are sitting on the head of constable Pralhad and his two senior officers one day Pande an accused in the robbery gets caught with looted booty in his confession he tells that this is only half the booty he looted the remaining is kept at his native in Bihar.Pralhad and his senior officers who haven't taken a holiday since long decide to travel to Bihar for holiday in the name of solving the case.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

Andheri police station is under scanner for number of crime rates and recent loots of jewelry shops Commissioner CP Singh visits the police station and warns them to take a quick solution.PSI Pralhad Ghodke,PSI Subash Jhadav and API Dilip Thakur are always targeted by their seniors and are also dealing with their personal issues they manage to get leads investigating themselves and find that thief behind jewelry shops is Manoj Pandey.They lay a trap for him and and get him arrested but the cops manage to recover few looted jewelry from him while the remaining is kept at his village in Bihar.Pralhad,Subash and Dilip along with Manoj travel by train to his village to find the loot but Manoj goes missing in between the journey and Dilip holds Pralhad responsible for trusting him.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
